pages.text: The $(mob)Rifter$() is a monster that spawns in the $(thing)Midnight$(), and in the presence of $(thing)Rifts$() on the surface of the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. While in the $(thing)Midnight$(), it attempts to get into melee to attack players on sight.

When spawned from a $(thing)Rift$() in the $(thing)Overworld, a $(mob)Rifter$() will seek out the nearest passive animal or player and grab them, stunning and slowly dragging the target into the $(thing)Rift$() that spawned them, transporting them to the $(thing)Midnight$(). It can teleport when not observed by the player. $(mob)Rifters$() spawned from a $(thing)Rift$() cannot survive in the $(thing)Overworld$() for long, and will perish if their rift closes before they are able to return.
